definition[0]: used to agree with what someone says or to answer ‘yes’ to a question
example[0]: ‘I gather you work in the sales department?’ ‘That’s right.’
example[1]: ‘Some people find it very difficult to work quickly.’ ‘That’s right, and they often find exams very stressful.’
definition[1]: used when you are telling someone that you are angry about what they are doing
example[2]: That’s right! Just blame me for everything, as usual!
